title: Fort Donelson National Battlefield: 2009-Fort Donelson Eagles
body: 2009 Fort Donelson Eagles                    Student Artwork   2 Photos            Fort Donelson July Special Events   8 Photos  Special Events Conducted at Fort Donelson National Battlefield In July 2007          Junior Rangers   8 Photos  New Fort Donelson Junior Rangers            148th Anniversary Events   4 Photos  148th Anniversary Events          Army Navy Exhibit   11 Photos  Army Navy exhibit of period Civil War Weapons, and equipment          2009 Fort Donelson Eagles   7 Photos  Once again the Eagles nested at Fort Donelson and raised a single Eaglet            Junior Ranger Day, Cavalry   5 Photos  12th Heavy Artillery USCT          12th Heavy Artillery USCT   5 Photos  Re-enactors with the 12th U.S. Colored Heavy Artillery (USCHA) share stories about life as an African-American soldier at Fort Donelson. (April 2009)          First Bloom/Public Lands Day   11 Photos  In conjunction with the Day of Service and Celebration, local Girl Scouts kick-offed the parkâ€™s First Bloom Project. Scouts will be sharing free native plantings and educational materials with visitors.            147th Anniversary Encampment   4 Photos  147th Anniversary Encampment          Story Tellers   3 Photos  Story Tellers Sparky & Rhonda Rucker          African American Heritage Weekend   5 Photos  In April 2009, historian Nancy J. Dawson and her students from Western Kentucky University performed an original historical drama about African-American soldiers and their families at Fort Donelson.
